titleInfo.title: U. S. Male's Tuesday Night Music Club

mods.abstract: Three color window card (blue, yellow, and red on white) announcing U.S. Male's Tuesday Night Music Club Blockbuster Music featuring Common Children on January 7, John Mohead and the Duane Jarvis Band on January 14, House Band Auditions on January 21, and Phil Keaggy on January 28. Poster features metal photoplate of a diver.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
